contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 2013 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-third-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Jayne Moxon, flugel (Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda) Best Euphonium: John Ayres (Severn Tunnel) 7 bands competed
May 19, 2013, 1:19 p.m. June 30, 2020, 11:03 a.m.
1 Upper Rhondda Brass Band Gareth Robinson A Saddleworth Festival Overture
2 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
3 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Alice Jones Olympus
4 Severn Tunnel Band Christopher Bond Music for a Festival [Sparke]
5 Abertillery & District Youth Kerry Bowden Valerius Variations
6 Ystradgynlais Public Band Alex Parker Anglian Dances
7 Oakdale Silver Band Adrian Browning First Suite in Eb [arr. Herbert]
Withdrawn Melingriffith 2 Band Dewi Griffiths
